subject: Re: Thank you for your application, we are accepting your refinance debt request
body:
Your credit score does not matter to us!
If you OWN real estate and want IMMEDIATE money to spend ANY way you like, or simply wish to LOWER your monthly payments by a third or more, here is our best deal we can offer you THIS NIGHT (hurry, this tender will expire THIS NIGHT):
$455,000+ loan
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest entire payment!
Hurry, when our deal is gone, it is gone. Simply fill in this simple form... 
Don't worry about approval, your credit will not disqualify you!
http://storeasupsmore.com/
